isis.stitle: International® MaxxForce™ 7 Engine Service Manual - Front Cover, Cooling System, and Related Components - Removal - Front Oil Seal and Wear Sleeve

svcproc.title: Front Oil Seal and Wear Sleeve

note.para: The International ® MaxxForce™ 7 is not equipped with a wear sleeve during factory production. Wear sleeves are available with an oil seal service kit.
If removing only the seal, perform steps 1 through 3. Otherwise, remove seal and wear sleeve using steps 1 through 4.

warning.para: To prevent personal injury or death, wear safety glasses with side shields when doing the following procedure.

step1.para: With an awl and hammer, punch two holes 180° apart in front oil seal.

Thread a slide hammer
with correct size screw in one of the two holes.
Slide hammer until one side of seal begins to pull out of oil pump housing assembly. Move slide hammer to other hole and repeat until front oil seal is removed completely.

note.para: The following steps are necessary if engine has a front wear sleeve. Wear sleeves are only available in oil seal service kits.

step1.para: Complete following steps to install front wear sleeve remover ZTSE4517 :

step2.para: Install two half shell ridges of tool behind front wear sleeve.
Place threaded shaft and pulling flange inside two shells while holding shells together.
Slide outer collar of tool around two half shells.
Thread shaft up to crankshaft, and turn shaft to remove wear sleeve.
